title: New features coming soon
body: Check back at the end of January to see new features on this website!

title: Repositive official launch
body: Repositive Launches Full Version of its Platform. GigaDB has all its Human related data indexed in repositive. Read their blog about the launch here http://blog.repositive.io/repositive-launches-full-version

title: Join the team!
body:
Position: Data Editor

Employer: GigaScience (BGI-HK, Publishing Department)

Location: BGI, Tai Po, Hong Kong SAR or potentially via Telecommunication

Start time: As soon as available

Salary: Commensurate with experience

Download job advert here: ftp://climb.genomics.cn/pub/DataEditorAdvert.pdf

Brief Job Description: The Data Editor will be responsible for reading research manuscripts that are being considered for publication at the journal and identifying the data, software, tools, scripts etc. that have been generated or used to carry out all the scientific analyses in a manuscript.

title: GigaDB attending GSC19 in Brisbane
body:
GigaDB lead biocurator Chris Hunter will be at this years Genomics Standards Consortium.

The meeting will take place at the Stamford Plaza, Brisbane, Australia between 15th-17th May, 2017. The theme of the meeting will be Extending Standards to Viruses and Microbial Eukaryotes. The agenda is packed with exciting sessions and topics: Viral classification and genome standards Microbial eukaryote classification and genome standards Bioinformatic workflow standards, (large scale, reproducible, cost-effective) Microbiomes of Australia Modes and tempo of evolution Genome taxonomy For further details about GSC19, please see the meeting page.

title: A Passion for Morphing Passiflora Leaves: Author Q&A with Daniel Chitwood
body:
GigaBlog: A Passion for Morphing Passiflora Leaves: Author Q&A with Daniel Chitwood.
GigaScience Editor Nicole interviews Daniel Chitwood, author of the recent GigaScience publication "Morphometric analysis of Passiflora leaves: the relationship between landmarks of the vasculature and elliptical Fourier descriptors of the blade" and GigaDB dataset 100251.

title: ISMB2018 Chicago
body: GigaScience and GigaDB teams will be attending ISMB 2018 in Chicago next month. Lookout for the GigaDB poster demonstrating our new look webpage being launched in time to for the GigaScience 6th birthday at ISMB.

title: PAG conference blog
body: Under Construction: Plant and Animal Genomes Get a Refurb

title: Planned maintenance 31st May 20:00 â€“ 1st Jun 07:00(CST)
body:
Due to essential maintenance of the server room, our database will be offline for up to 11 hours on the night of May 31st between the hours of 8pm (CST) and 7am the following morning (June 1st). All times are stated in local time (China Standard Time), which is GMT+8.
During this time the website will be unable to display any datasets or perform any search queries.
The data files within datasets are served from a different location and are un-effected, so you may access the FTP server directly here: 
ftp://parrot.genomics.cn/gigadb/pub/10.5524/100001_101000/
You can find the data files for each dataset under their respective DOI sub-folders:
e.g.
ftp://parrot.genomics.cn/gigadb/pub/10.5524/100001_101000/100748/
Please accept our apologies for any inconvenience caused.
Best Wishes
The GigaDB Team
